channel.title: Ok lumbie stairs
channel.description:
ok i have all the doors working in lumbridge castle (no problem) but i don't know what code to put on for (climb up) the stairs ? from the middle floor to the roof ? i know the object number 1738 i wish to make it ask me if i want
to go up or down one on middel floor
